CutSceneText.Text: Above the Arkanis Sky Temple are floating discs,
each one occupied by a protector with the key to another disc.
The Protector of the Wind Key is on the water disc,
the Protector of the Fire Key is on the wind disc,
and on the fire disc is Flame Judge Bolcan, who holds the final key.
Defeat them all and get all the keys.
This must be the water disc.
I'd better look for the Protector of the Wind Key first.
